Package p4_group_8_repo

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    this class represents the actors/characters/objects/images that will appear inside the game
    Animal
    this class represents the characters/animals of the game which is the frog it is a subclass of Actor
    BackgroundImage
    this class is to set the images that needed in the game it is a subclass of Actor
    Digit
    this class represents the digit that appears in the top right screen to indicate the score it is a subclass of Actor
    End
    this class represents the destinations of the animal(frog) it is a subclass of Actor
    EndScene
    this class represents the ending stage of the game
    Fly
    this class represents the fly with the destination it is a subclass of Actor
    GameLife
    this class represents the game life it is a subclass of Actor
    Level1
    this class represents the Stage of Level 1 of the game this class is to add all the needed things into level 1's scene it is a subclass of MyStage
    Level2
    this class represents Level 2 Stage of the game this class is to add all the needed things into level 2's scene This level includes all objects in level 1 and the newly added Game Life it is a subclass of MyStage
    Level3
    this class represents Level 3 Stage of the game this class is to add all the needed things into level 3's scene This level includes all objects in level 2 and the newly added Fly it is a subclass of MyStage
    Level4
    this class represents Level 4 Stage of the game this class is to add all the needed things into level 4's scene This level includes all objects in level 3 and the newly added Snake it is a subclass of MyStage
    Level5
    this class represents Level 5 Stage of the game this class is to add all the needed things into level 5's scene This level includes all objects in level 4, but their speed has changed more faster it is a subclass of MyStage
    Log
    this class represents the log object it is a subclass of Actor
    Main  
    MyStage
    this class represents the stage and background music of the game it is a subclass of World
    Obstacle
    this class represents the obstacle and its action it is a subclass of Actor
    ScoreList
    this class represents the ending score list it is to save and read the score for each round into/from a file
    Snake
    this class represents the actor snake it is a subclass of Actor
    StartScene
    this class represents the starting stage of the game
    Turtle
    this class represents the turtle it is a subclass of Actor
    WetTurtle
    this class represents the wet turtle it is a subclass of Actor
    World
    this class represents the game world it can add/remove the actors to the world and start/stop the actors for their actions/animations
